name: The 4th International Symposium on Business and Social Science
content: The ISBASS Conference aims to provide a communication platform for scholars, professionals, academics and graduate students not only to present their recent and latest researches but also share their thoughts and discuss the future development in the field of business and social science, and to discuss the future developments and possible challenges faced. All theoretical, empirical and practical papers from scholars and professionals in the above fields are all highly welcome. The 2016 International Symposium on Business and Social Science (The 4th ISBASS) is scheduled to take place in Jeju Island, from April 19-21, 2016.
